title: Interstellar
description: A group of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to save humanity from extinction.

title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
description: A daydreamer escapes his mundane life by embarking on a global journey of self-discovery and adventure.

title: Wonder
description: A boy with facial differences enters a mainstream school, inspiring those around him to see beyond appearances.

title: CODA
description: The only hearing member of a deaf family pursues her passion for singing, challenging family dynamics.

title: The Royal Tenenbaums
description: A dysfunctional family of prodigies reunites when their estranged father announces his terminal illness.

title: August: Osage County
description: A family crisis brings the strong-willed women of the Weston family back to their dysfunctional home.

title: En man som heter Ove
description: A grumpy retiree forms an unexpected friendship with his new neighbors, leading to a change in perspective.

title: Her
description: A lonely man develops an emotional connection with an artificial intelligence operating system.

title: The worst person in the world
description: A young woman navigates through love and life, facing the complexities of adulthood and self-discovery.

title: Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring
description: A Buddhist monk's life unfolds in a tranquil monastery, experiencing the cyclical nature of existence.

title: The Fountain
description: Spanning centuries, a man seeks immortality to save his dying wife, exploring themes of love and mortality.

title: Arrival
description: A linguist is recruited to communicate with extraterrestrial visitors, unraveling the mysteries of their intentions.

title: Inside Out
description: Emotions personified guide a young girl through the challenges of growing up, exploring joy, sadness, and more.

title: Another Earth
description: Parallel universes and redemption intersect as a woman grapples with a tragic event and a new Earth is discovered.

title: I Origins
description: A molecular biologist's life takes unexpected turns as he explores scientific discoveries and the nature of existence.

title: Mr. Nobody
description: In a world where a man is the last mortal human, he reflects on alternate lives and the impact of choices.

title: The Truman Show
description: A man's life is a televised reality show, but he starts questioning the artificiality of his seemingly perfect world.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
description: After a painful breakup, a couple undergoes a procedure to erase memories, leading to unexpected revelations.

title: Before Sunrise
description: Two strangers meet on a train and spend an unforgettable night in Vienna, contemplating life and love.

title: Before Sunset
description: Reconnecting after years, a couple wanders through Paris, exploring the complexities of their past and present.

title: Before Midnight
description: The enduring love story continues as a couple faces new challenges during a summer vacation in Greece.

title: This Is Us
description: A heartwarming family drama that follows the lives of the Pearson family through different timelines.

title: Ted Lasso
description: A feel-good comedy about an American football coach who becomes the coach of a struggling English soccer team.

title: After Life
description: A dark comedy-drama series created by Ricky Gervais, exploring themes of grief and redemption.

title: Brassic
description: A British comedy series that follows the misadventures of a group of friends living in a small town.

title: Chernobyl
description: A historical drama miniseries depicting the Chernobyl nuclear disaster and its aftermath.

title: Silo
description: A series that explores the challenges and dangers of working in confined spaces such as silos.

title: The Boys
description: A dark and irreverent take on the superhero genre, exploring the consequences of superpowers in the real world.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high-stakes drama about a high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer.

title: Dexter: New Blood
description: A continuation of the Dexter series, following the life of the forensic blood spatter analyst with a dark secret.

title: BoJack Horseman
description: An animated series that satirizes Hollywood and explores the life of a washed-up horse actor.

title: The Mandalorian
description: A Star Wars series following the adventures of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy.

title: Altered Carbon
description: A cyberpunk series set in a future where consciousness can be transferred to different bodies, exploring themes of identity and mortality.

title: Prison Break
description: A suspenseful series about a man who deliberately gets himself imprisoned to help his wrongly accused brother escape.

title: The Walking Dead
description: A post-apocalyptic horror series that follows a group of survivors as they navigate a world overrun by zombies.

title: True Blood
description: A supernatural drama series set in a world where vampires and humans coexist, exploring the dynamics and conflicts between the two species.

title: Rick and Morty
description: An animated sci-fi sitcom that follows the adventures of an eccentric and alcoholic scientist and his good-hearted but easily influenced grandson.

title: The Queenâ€™s Gambit
description: A coming-of-age drama that follows a young orphaned chess prodigy as she rises to the top of the competitive chess world.

title: Supernatural
description: A long-running series following two brothers who hunt demons, ghosts, monsters, and other supernatural beings.

title: Euphoria
description: A teen drama series that explores the complexities of modern adolescence, including love, identity, and addiction.

title: Halt and Catch Fire
description: A drama series set in the tech industry during the personal computer revolution and the rise of the World Wide Web.

title: Shameless
description: A dramedy series that follows the dysfunctional Gallagher family as they navigate life's challenges in Chicago's South Side.

title: Better Call Saul
description: A prequel to Breaking Bad, focusing on the transformation of Jimmy McGill, a small-time lawyer, into the morally challenged lawyer Saul Goodman.

title: Gravity Falls
description: An animated mystery-comedy series following the adventures of two siblings spending their summer with their great-uncle in a mysterious town.

title: The Sopranos
description: A critically acclaimed drama series that follows the life of mob boss Tony Soprano as he navigates the challenges of leading a criminal organization.
